GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v6.0.7
GSD.description:
drm/msm/a6xx: Replace kcalloc() with kvzalloc()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.7 by commit ecd63b2fbabc8fd6e5355c25fe1e186a74fa5272, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit b859f9b009bbfbc236d9b076c64c59ccb41b8737. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:
